meanings.definition: An act or instance of miscalculating.
meanings.sent1: Her miscalculation led to a wrong answer on the test.
meanings.sent2: The miscalculation in the budget caused financial issues.
meanings.sent3: The miscalculation in the recipe made the cake taste strange.
meanings.sent4: His miscalculation in estimating the distance left him lost in the woods.
meanings.sent5: The miscalculation of the time made her miss the bus.

meanings.sent1: The miscalculation of the ingredients ruined the dish.
meanings.sent2: After the miscalculation, they had to redo the entire project.
meanings.sent3: The miscalculation in the game cost them the victory.
meanings.sent4: His miscalculation in timing made him late for the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The miscalculation of the distance caused them to take the wrong path.
